markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Great Tengu Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=5691) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 35 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Long-Nosed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=5682)

</column>

---

You take on the imposing form of a large, winged spirit. Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-rank [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514) and [fly](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=136). This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.
name: Great Tengu Form

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Great Tengu Form Source Player Core 2 pg. 35 1.1 Prerequisites Long-Nosed Form --- You take on the imposing form of a large, winged spirit. Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-rank enlarge and fly. This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.
